Posts.Content: I've done mastectomy, chemo, RT, 10 months off work, all the tamoxifen side effects, all the fears and tears......and I've not felt moved to post. Until I saw that Ms Derbyshire pronounce that "breast cancer is do-able"! Really? Made a bit more sense when I realised her comments were made pre-chemo! I'm not too sure why I feel so angry about her comments...but I do!!
Posts.Title: Anybody else been Victoria Derbyshired????????
